General.Name: Anhui Jinchun Nonwoven Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Jinchun Nonwoven Co., Ltd. produces and sell nonwoven products. It offers spunlace nonwovens for use in sanitary, decoration, and industrial materials; hot air nonwovens for use in civil cleaning; silk microfiber nonwovens for use in civil cleaning, decoration, and industrial materials; and meltblown nonwovens for use in sanitary materials, industrial materials, and other fields. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Chuzhou, China.
